mapper.select: SELECT sr.name_ AS recycle_name, sr.tel, srcl.cancel_reason, srcl.order_id, srcl.recycler_id, date_format(srcl.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS cancelDate FROM sb_recycle_cancel_log srcl INNER JOIN sb_recyclers sr WHERE sr.del_flag = '0' AND srcl.recycler_id = sr.id AND srcl.order_id = #{orderBean.id} ORDER BY srcl.create_date DESC LIMIT 0,1
